title: Awesome Appwrite Snippets
desc: Awesome Appwrite Snippets is a collection of commonly used Appwrite APIs. It increases your speed of development by eliminating most of the boilerplate code associated with making using Appwrite in your Project.

title: Parivartan
desc: A course offering website for students to find the best course for them.

title: Face-X
desc: Demonstration of different algorithms and operations on faces. Despite a variety of open-source face recognition frameworks available, there was no ready-made solution to implement.

title: Bot Collection
desc: A collection of bots which will help to automate everything

title: Cartoonist
desc: It is a collection of different types of cartoons, designs, logos, and characters available on the same platform that will be helpful for programmers in their projects.
